N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-15.1 - Provisions for on-site environmental monitors

State Regulations
(a) The department will establish on-site
environmental monitors as necessary to monitor compliance with the permit for
the land disposal facility, to be funded by the permittee, as a condition of
the permit. (b) The permittee must
provide access to all regulated areas on-site and adequate office space for the
on-site environmental monitors. Notes
